channel.title: Experience Rates
channel.description:
I'm about to change the experience rate in my MoparClassic server. So I have a few questions:
[ol][li]What is the difference between expRate and subExpRate in the world.config file?[/li] [li]Are they multipliers to another value?[/li] [li]What rates are reasonable yet playable and fun?[/li][/ol]
Thanks!

item.title: Experience Rates
item.dc:creator: @RylandAlmanza RylandAlmanza
item.description:
@RylandAlmanza wrote:

Thanks, waj. rep++

Read full topic

item.title: Experience Rates
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

expRate - The experience rate of the server
subExpRate - The experience for subscribers

And for the other, well everyone would tell you differently, some are lazier than others and ect

And also take a look at Player class at the incExp method like so:

double exprate = Config.expRate; if (isSubscriber()) { exprate = Config.subExpRate; }
You can basically see how the sub exp is done.

Read full topic
